natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer
Class Conjunctor

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.surfacerealizer.Conjunctor
All Implemented Interfaces:
LibraryConstants, RDGTransformer
public class Conjunctor
extends java.lang.Object
implements RDGTransformer, LibraryConstants

At the moment this class creates a grammatical Dependency Tree out of a relation and a appropriate cue word.
